stories.title: Family Secrets - Episode 1
stories.storyDescription: Summoned to a vast estate by a family matriarch, journalist Hannah Bright uncovers dangerous family secrets and feels an attraction she can’t deny.
stories.creator: web-uploader
stories.postPaywallNotification: Is someone trying to harm Hannah?! Read FAMILY SECRETS to find out.
